name: Visually, Inc.
description: Provider of a platform that connects creators of infographic content with audiences and publishers. The company's platform connects designers, journalists, animators and developers with clients, featuring cloud-based collaboration tools to enable content delivery.
one_liner: Provider of a platform that connects creators of infographic content with audiences and publishers. The company's platform connects designers, journalists, animators and developers with clients, featuring cloud-based collaboration tools to enable content delivery.
